sense.def:
Got
je preteklik in pretekli deležnik glagola
to get
.

Izraz
have got
lahko uporabimo namesto bolj formalnega
have
, kadar govorimo o lastnini predmetov: glej
have
.

seg.quote: Have you got any brochures on Holland?
That door's got a lock on it.

sense.def:
Izraz
have got to
lahko uporabimo namesto bolj formalnih izrazov
have to
ali
must
, kadar govorimo o nečem, kar mora biti storjeno.

seg.quote: We've got to get up early tomorrow.
There's got to be some motive.
